attributes.action: recognise more help needs to be given to help mothers return to work after starting a family by offering more towards child care cost.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I felt I had to start this petition aftet been offered a full time job with take home pay of £ 1300 per month and realising my child care costs for full time 2 children would be £1200. We need more help.
I was offered "£29 child tax credits???
